high_descs: Turn around turn right go straight to the sink
Pick the bread from the sink.
Turn around  go straight walk near to the microwave
Place the bread  into the microwave
anns.task_desc: Pick the bread from the sink and Place the bread  into the microwave

high_descs:
turn around go straight and turn left to reach the sink
pick up the bread from the sink 
turn right walk along go to the microwave oven 
place the bread in the microwave oven
anns.task_desc: place the bread in the microwave oven

high_descs: Turn around and go straight, turn right towards the sink
Pick up bread from the sink
Turn around and go straight, turn right towards the microwave
Put the bread in the microwave
anns.task_desc: Shifting bread from one place to another
